more_info.origin: Potassium salts of malic acid (), a natural acid present in fruits.
more_info.characteristics: Potassium malate is used as a buffer and flavouring.
more_info.daily_intake: No limit, but the D,L - and D-isomers are not allowed in infant food, as infants lack the necessary enzymes to metabolise these compounds.
more_info.dietary_restrictions: Malic acid and malates can be used by all religious groups, vegans and vegetarians.
